alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 11:11PM EST until January 29 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Southeast Montgomery County. District of Columbia. In Virginia, Arlington/Falls Church/Alexandria, and Prince William/Manassas/Manassas Park and Fairfax Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
